tossup_question: -   –  Some scholars believe that Algol was recognised as a variable star in ancient times. Other than possibly Algol, what was the first known variable star?
tossup_answer: ANSWER: MIRA (ACCEPT: OMICRON CETI, O CETI)
bonus_question: -   –   What are the units used to measure helicity?
bonus_answer: ANSWER: METERS SQUARED PER SECONDS SQUARED
